name: Memory Game (olm)
description:
Memory Game

A simple classic memory game, in which you turn cards and try to find out matching pairs. This game is currently meant to be played like solitaire, there's no bookkeeping of highscores or such. 

The only achievement currently available in this game is unlockable cards. You can unlock new cards by grinding the game :). 

Supported PlatformsTested on Windows 10 / Chrome, IOS / Safari (iPad). 
Controls
  • Mouse / Touch 
    • Navigate menus.
    • turn cards.
  • Q-key 
    • Quit game while playing.

This game is meant to be played on desktop, although it does function with touch interfaces with the exception of quit functionality. A touch solution for quit will be added later. This game was really not designed for small screens.

Statistics

You can check your gameplay statistics and unlocked cards in the statistics screen of the game, which can be accessed via the main menu. 

Settings
  • You can set the game length in settings (1-10 tables.)
  • Audio can be toggled on/off.
  • There's also option to reset your game progress and settings.
